DOC.detailed_description: The study consist two part , first part compose pilot part compare bioavailability single oral dos XS003 compare Tasigna® give single oral dose healthy male subject . The second part food-effect part assess food effect single oral dose XS003 healthy male subject either fed fast . The study also evaluate safety tolerability XS003 secondary objective .
DOC.criteria: Healthy male Age 18 55 year age Body mass index ( BMI ) 18.0 29.0 kg/m2 Laboratory parameter normal range Females Current smoker smoke within last 12 month . A breath carbon monoxide read great 10 ppm screening . Serious adverse reaction serious hypersensitivity drug formulation excipients . History cardiovascular , renal , hepatic , chronic respiratory gastrointestinal disease judge investigator . Subject QTcF > 450 m base ECG screen history additional risk factor Torsades de Pointe ( e.g . hypokalaemia , hypomagnesemia , family history long QT syndrome )
